item.description:
I've wanted to try this place since it was voted the #2 Best Greek restaurant in the Hartford Advocate's Readers poll (also voted best restaurant and best pizza)!! Looks like there is plenty of parking. Yumm....spanakopita, moussaka, artichoke hearts white pizza!! Here is their website: http://cavostavern.co...

As always: Please be courteous and come on time, be sure to change your RSVP if you can't make it at least 48 hours in advance. I will collect $1.00 toward the costs of running this meetup at the event.

απολαμβάνω (Enjoy!) - Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Cavos Tavern 11/4/09 at 7:00pm
